name: Cervélo P2 105 Time Trial Bike
description:
#Intermediate #S

The Cervélo P2 is an entry-level time trial bike designed for speed, comfort, and precise handling. Its aerodynamic frame features a giant seat tube that shields the rear wheel and sleek internal cable routing to reduce drag. The bike’s thoughtful design includes a slim hourglass head tube and a recessed fork crown to minimize wind resistance. While the bike excels in performance and comfort, its brake setup favors a right-hand rear brake for optimal cable routing and maintenance.
- Aerodynamic carbon frame
- Shimano 105 groupset
- Internal cable routing
- Entry-level TT performance
